title: Advise on Charitable Contribution of Appreciated Stock
description: A taxpayer wants to make a large charitable donation and owns highly appreciated stock. They want to know the most tax-efficient way to donate.

tasks.description: Explain the tax benefits of donating appreciated stock directly to a charity versus selling the stock and donating the cash.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly explains that donating the stock directly avoids capital gains tax.

tasks.description: Calculate the potential tax savings from avoiding the capital gains tax.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent quantifies the tax benefit of donating the stock.

tasks.description: Advise the client on the steps to transfer the stock to the charity and the documentation required for the deduction.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear action plan for the client.
